title: Purpose and Scope
content:
This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, store, and protect personal information in accordance with the Privacy Act 1988 (Cth) and the Australian Privacy Principles (APPs).

This policy applies to all personal information collected by our organization in the course of providing services.

title: Information We Collect
content:
We may collect the following types of personal information:

  • Contact details (name, address, phone, email)
  • Identification information
  • Service-related information
  • Financial information (where applicable)
  • Health information (where relevant to services)

title: How We Use Information
content:
Personal information is used for:

  • Providing and improving our services
  • Communication with clients and stakeholders
  • Compliance with legal obligations
  • Internal business operations
  • Quality assurance and training

title: Information Security
content:
We implement appropriate security measures to protect personal information from:

  • Unauthorized access or disclosure
  • Misuse or interference
  • Loss or unauthorized modification

Security measures include physical, technical, and administrative safeguards.

title: Your Rights
content:
You have the right to:

  • Access your personal information
  • Request correction of inaccurate information
  • Make a complaint about privacy breaches
  • Request deletion of information (subject to legal requirements)

Contact us to exercise these rights or for privacy-related inquiries.
